DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the exercise protocol called "Siriraj home base exercise program for OA knee" to usual care and physical modalities for conservative treatment in patients with 1st OA knee.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Siriraj Home Exercises Protocol for Primary Osteoarthritis of the Knee
DOC.criteria: 1st osteoarthritis of the knee Age >/= 50 yrs Previous knee surgery for OA knee treatment Has plan or schedule for knee surgery Severe degree of OA knee.
